chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
m: nat
n: nat
Hreg: forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q

Goal:
instruction_compiler_sound bsm_instr_compile (bsm_sss (n:=m)) (mm_sss (n:=n)) bsm_state_enc

Premises:
bsm_instr_compile = fun (lnk : nat -> nat) (i : nat) (ii : bsm_instr m) => match ii with | POP s j k => mm_pop (reg s) tmp1 tmp2 (lnk i) (lnk j) (lnk (1 + i)) (lnk k) | PUSH s One => mm_push_One (reg s) tmp1 tmp2 (lnk i) | PUSH s Zero => mm_push_Zero (reg s) tmp1 tmp2 (lnk i) end : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> bsm_instr m -> list (mm_instr (pos n)) Arguments bsm_instr_compile _%function_scope _%nat_scope
Notation pos := Fin.t
bsm_sss : forall n : nat, bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n -> Prop
mm_sss : forall n : nat, mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop
reg = fun p : pos m => pos_nxt (pos_nxt p) : pos m -> pos n
instruction_compiler_sound : forall X Y : Set, ((nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) -> forall state_X state_Y : Type, (X -> nat * state_X -> nat * state_X -> Prop) -> (Y -> nat * state_Y -> nat * state_Y -> Prop) -> (state_X -> state_Y -> Prop) -> Prop
Tauto.Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?TX : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?AA : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?AF : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?TX : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?AA : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?AF : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
Tauto.D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?TX : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?AA : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?AF : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
Tauto.X : ?TX -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?TX : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?AA : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?AF : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
Tauto.N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?TX : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?AA : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?AF : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?TX : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?AA : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?AF : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
Fin.eqb : pos ?m -> pos ?n -> bool where ?m : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- nat] ?n : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- nat]
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Prop] ?B : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Prop]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?B : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?B : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Prop] ?B : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Prop]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type] ?B : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
MMA_HALTING : MMA_PROBLEM ?n -> Prop where ?n : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- nat]
code_end : code ?X -> nat where ?X : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
code_start : code ?X -> nat where ?X : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
EnvRing.Pc : ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
EnvRing.PEc : ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
VarMap.Elt : ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
EnvRing.PEX : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
MMA_HALTS_ON_ZERO : MMA_PROBLEM ?n -> Prop where ?n : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- nat]
in_code : nat -> code ?X -> Prop where ?X : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
out_code : nat -> code ?X -> Prop where ?X : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]

None : option ?A where ?A : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
pos_nxt : pos ?n -> pos (S ?n) where ?n : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- nat]
pos0 : pos (S ?n) where ?n : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- nat]
vec_one : pos ?n -> vec nat ?n where ?n : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- nat]
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- nat]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
vec_zero : vec nat ?n where ?n : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- nat]
EnvRing.PEmul : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
EnvRing.PEadd : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
subcode : code ?X -> nat * list ?X -> Prop where ?X : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- Type]
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : pos ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [m : nat n := 2 + m : nat Hreg : forall p q : pos m, reg p = reg q -> p = q |- nat]
bsm_steps_POP_any_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (b : bool) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = b :: ll -> p = 1 + i -> st <> (i, v) -> sss_steps (bsm_sss (n:=n)) P a (i, v) st -> {b0 : nat | b0 < a /\ sss_steps (bsm_sss (n:=n)) P b0 (1 + i, v[ll/x]) st}
bsm_steps_POP_E_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = nil -> st <> (i, v) -> sss_steps (bsm_sss (n:=n)) P a (i, v) st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ sss_steps (bsm_sss (n:=n)) P b (q, v) st}
bsm_steps_POP_0_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = Zero :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> sss_steps (bsm_sss (n:=n)) P a (i, v) st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ sss_steps (bsm_sss (n:=n)) P b (p, v[ll/x]) st}

```coq
unfold instruction_compiler_sound. intros lnk i ii.
destruct ii; simpl; intros; eauto using mm_pop, mm_push_One, mm_push_Zero.
Qed.```

original: unfold instruction_compiler_sound. intros lnk i ii. destruct ii; simpl; intros; eauto using mm_pop, mm_push_One, mm_push_Zero.
